| History                 = The Hydra Youth Choir was established after [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]]'s conquest of the United States with the purpose to foster camaraderie, provide a sense of belonging and sway allegiances among the youngest members of the new society.

As part of her plan to take down Hydra's leader [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]] had two of the [[Champions (Earth-616)|Champions]], [[Amadeus Cho (Earth-616)|Amadeus Cho]] and [[Nadia Van Dyne (Earth-616)|Nadia Pym]], infiltrate the three-day audition process with the goal to join the Youth Choir, which would give them the opportunity to perform at a ceremony in the [[Capitol Building]] in front of Captain America himself.

One night when Amadeus and Nadia rendezvoused with [[Miles Morales (Earth-1610)|Spider-Man]] in secret, two Hydra guards noticed them. With their mission at stake, Amadeus managed to keep his cover by calling out for help, though it cost Nadia hers. Amadeus eventually made it to the Choir, having also gained a reputation by allegedly having confronted the Champions.{{r|Secret Empire: Uprising Vol 1 1}}
